TopicTitle: How to Attach Pictures to Posts and Comments

Articles.Content:
I have finally decided to start posting my adventures in KSP on here for the wider Kerbal Kommunity to enjoy (I already do it on Facebook), but I have no idea how to get the images into the initial post, and then the comments that will be following it. 
Any help would be appreciated.
Oh, just paste the url for the image, and it will try and convert it to an inline image

You have to host your images somewhere other than the forum. Imgur.com is popular but by no means the only option. Once hosted get the URL for the image itself (must end in .jpg, .png, .gif, etc) and paste it into a post and it will embed automatically.
